author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qpr Software Plc Q4 Net Sales Up At Eur ‍2​.4 Million
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - QPR SOFTWARE PLC:
* REG-STRONG GROWTH IN LICENSE SALES
* Q4 NET SALES EUR ‍2​.4 MILLION VERSUS EUR 2.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 OPERATING PROFIT EUR ‍187​,000 VERSUS EUR 252,000 YEAR AGO
* ‍PROPOSES TO ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING THAT A DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.03 BE PAID​
* ‍ESTIMATES THAT ITS NET SALES WILL GROW IN 2018​ * ‍NET SALES FROM CONSULTING SERVICES ARE ALSO EXPECTED TO GROW FROM PREVIOUS YEAR.​
* ‍ESTIMATES THAT ITS COMPARABLE OPERATING PROFIT WILL IMPROVE FROM PREVIOUS YEAR.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
